item.description:
This time we will discuss different ways of preserving the harvest.  Your group organizer will describe a modern way to create a root cellar.  She will also demonstrate how to dehydrate foods. So bring something you want to place in her dehydrator at the beginning of the meeting and you can take it with you as you leave!

We will be referring to instructions from "Dare to Prepare" by Holly Drennan Deyo, and also information provided by Healthy Days Health News. (Click on that name to bring up their site.)

Other members are invited to bring additional referance guides, and share details about anything they have been doing along these lines.

                       ____________

 

Please don't go up the driveway with ULCS Clinic sign.  Instead go up the first driveway, which is across the street from mailbox #298.  No need to knock.  Just go on downstairs.

The quickest way to contact the group organizer is by sending an e-mail to info@ulcsclinic.com.  Please enter "Meetup Member" in subj. line. 

                            _______________

Why are we focused on preparedness at this time?

Extremely challenging times will soon be upon us, due to several situations which have reached a critical threshold. 

To better understand why our very survival depends upon personal preparedness steps we  take now, please view the following links:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eidQTDjQ5gw   (Crash Course - The Three E's)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nI-BIVWlc7A    (Resources & Monetary Systems)

http://www.krystalspiral.com/CamelotInterviews.htm (2012 Cosmic Energy Changes)
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Meetup sign on one of the tables.

group.name: Back to Basics: Sustainable Self-Sufficient Healthy Living

item.name: Back to Basics Food Preservation: Root Cellars and Food Dehyrators
